name: The Trials of Mystery
description:
This is an interactive narrative made in Twine finished for a university assignment. The player will navigate through a series of trials, orchestrated by a mysterious being who wants to test the player for his own reasons, revealed during the ending. Make sure you turn on full-screen before you start.

I hope you enjoy playing this game as much as I enjoyed making it, as this is the first time I have written a story with multiple choices and endings.
